synos.tran: 垃圾；轿，担架；一窝（动物的幼崽）；凌乱

remMethod.val: 把little的“l”乱丢， 错拿成“r” → 乱扔

words.tran: 在街道或公共场所乱丢垃圾的人

trans.tranOther: if things litter an area, there are a lot of them in that place, scattered in an untidy way

trans.tranCn: 废弃物， 垃圾； 一窝幼崽
trans.tranOther: waste paper, cans etc that people have thrown away and left on the ground in a public place
